data.message: whats good em my name is jonathan lomeli..22 years old .. a puertorican from cudahy california..i wanna be signed with shady..heard i had to batle you to get a shot..so i been uploading videos of myself spittin freestyles directed at you on youtube...my email is lomelijonathan4@gmail.com im a send you some links https://youtu.be/RkmVewy0i_o https://youtu.be/HkNxjeXADj8 https://youtu.be/nl3ExxECAng tell me whats good peace
